template.name: Template App Flumes
template.description: Flume metrics and alerts 一个主机上有很多个flume agent

trigger_prototype.name: {#NAME} Channel fill percentage is greater than 85%
{#NAME} Last minute event take attempts greater than event take success

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} BatchEmptyCount
item_prototype.description: 此值很高表示 source写入比slink 慢很多

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} BatchUnderflowCount
item_prototype.description: 此值很高表示slink 比source快
